definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: Among the Basic techniques are cross-stitch, crewel work, and quilting.
sentences.chinese: 最基本的技巧是十字針鏽和絎縫繡。

sentences.english: Black quilted tech fabric with tonal felt trim.
sentences.chinese: 黑色絎縫高科技面料與色調感覺修剪。

sentences.english: Fully quilted top to protect your mattress.
sentences.chinese: 充分絎縫頂部保護您的牀墊。

sentences.english: Military inspired jacket with removable quilted vest.
sentences.chinese: 軍事啓發可拆卸絎縫背心外套。

sentences.english: Convertible clutch made of vegan-friendly, quilted patent leather.
sentences.chinese: 可換股離合器素食主義者，友好，絎縫漆皮。

sentences.english: A thick bed quilt, sponge and leather products can also be handled.
sentences.chinese: 厚被，海綿，皮子等的絎縫作業也可以進行。

sentences.english: Made of quilted nylon with patent trim.
sentences.chinese: 絎縫與專利修剪尼龍製成。

sentences.english: Quilted exterior design keeps insulation from shifting.
sentences.chinese: 絎縫外觀設計保持絕緣轉移。

sentences.english: Made of quilted cotton fabric with colorful printed design.
sentences.chinese: 豐富多彩的印刷設計絎縫棉織物製成的。

sentences.english: Quilted product is one of important and exceptional home textiles.
sentences.chinese: 絎縫製品是家用紡織品中別具特色的一個重要品種。

definition: a long narrow vessel with two masts
the appearance of a mountain, as if two pots were standing one upon the other/the steep bank of a stream a rough mountain path
a kind of mosquito net/bed curtain
round basket used for feeding the cattle
to encase the end with metal
